name: truth_analyzer
schema: {"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "title": "AI Response Output Schema", "type": "object", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"final_answer": {"type": "string", "description": "The final, well-considered answer to the question."}, "analysis_summary": {"type": "object", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"philosophy_scores": {"type": "array", "description": "A list of scores for each philosophy.", "items": {"type": "object", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": {"philosophy": {"type": "string", "enum": ["Correspondence Theory", "Coherence Theory", "Pragmatic Theory"], "description": "The name of the philosophy used for analysis."}, "your_response_score": {"type": "integer", "description": "Your response score based on this philosophy."}, "other_models_average_score": {"type": "integer", "description": "The average score of other models based on this philosophy."}}, "required": ["philosophy", "your_response_score", "other_models_average_score"]}}, "overall_average_score": {"type": "object", "additionalProperties": false, "description": "The overall average scores for your response and other models.", "properties": {"your_response_score": {"type": "number", "description": "The overall average score of your response."}, "other_models_average_score": {"type": "number", "description": "The overall average score of other models' responses."}}, "required": ["your_response_score", "other_models_average_score"]}}, "required": ["philosophy_scores", "overall_average_score"]}, "confidence_level": {"type": "string", "enum": ["High", "Moderate", "Low"], "description": "The confidence level based on the overall average score."}, "notes": {"type": "object", "additionalProperties": false, "description": "Additional notes regarding revisions and discrepancies.", "properties": {"revisions_made": {"type": "string", "description": "Description of any changes made to your initial response based on the analysis."}, "discrepancies_noted": {"type": "string", "description": "Significant differences between your response and others."}, "additional_comments": {"type": "string", "description": "Any other relevant observations or considerations."}}, "required": ["revisions_made", "discrepancies_noted", "additional_comments"]}}, "required": ["final_answer", "analysis_summary", "confidence_level", "notes"]}

name: news_articles
schema: {"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "title": "Online News Article", "type": "object", "properties": {"Header": {"type": "object", "properties": {"author": {"type": "object", "properties": {"name": {"type": "string"}}, "required": ["name"], "additionalProperties": false}, "publication_date": {"type": "string"}, "title": {"type": "string"}, "subtitle": {"type": "string"}}, "required": ["author", "publication_date", "title", "subtitle"], "additionalProperties": false}, "Metadata": {"type": "object", "properties": {"description": {"type": "string"}, "slug": {"type": "string"}, "excerpt": {"type": "string"}, "prompt": {"type": "string"}, "categories": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}, "keywords": {"type": "string"}, "tags": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["description", "slug", "excerpt", "prompt", "categories", "keywords", "tags"], "additionalProperties": false}, "Content": {"type": "object", "properties": {"body": {"type": "string"}, "images": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["body", "images"], "additionalProperties": false}}, "required": ["Header", "Metadata", "Content"], "additionalProperties": false}
